text:
Hi all,
bad news this morning ... which was NOT there until yesterday
In theme preview (and theme settings) when I access some sections, the theme crashes with this warning. I immediately double-checked the field.jason file and everything is ok. Does it just happen to me or has it already happened to someone?
This happens on all themes (including HubSpot ones), even those that I have already edited as customers and that, until yesterday, had no problems
